EmailTemplate.subject: NCS - Information evening invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
NCS with The Challenge information evening invitation
Dear Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.Name} and {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for agreeing to come to the first day of our NCS programme on {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_KO_Day__c} in the hope that a place will become available. {!Contact.FirstName} is still on the waiting list but we hope that a place will become available on the day. To help prepare you for this, we would like to invite you both to a short information evening about the programme. Here you will have the opportunity to meet participants and parents/guardians, and to ask us any questions. {!Wave_Selection__c.Girl_only_wave_prog_email_sentence__c}The details are as follows:
Date: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Date__c} Time: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_time__c} Address: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_venue_and_address__c} {!Wave__c.Info_eve_additional_info__c}
The evening will last approximately 1 hour, with a short presentation starting within 15 minutes. Please arrive promptly so we can start on time.
Please confirm your attendance by emailing {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_SC_email_address__c} or by calling {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_mobile_number__c}.
This event is for parents/guardians, participants and those who have agreed to come along to the first day in the hope of getting a place. However, if you want to bring a friend who may be interested in NCS with The Challenge, please just let us know when confirming your attendance. We would be happy to meet them and discuss the likelihood of them getting a place.
We hope to see you at the information evening.
Yours sincerely,
{!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_lead_name__c} The Challenge
